ygData.subject: Re: The bum and the hole...
ygData.msgSnippet: The missles (The drunks and Grimlocks) exploded taking a chunk out of the cover that Branding was hiding behind. Holy Maker if you get me out of this alive I

The missles (The drunks and Grimlocks) exploded taking a chunk out of the
cover that Branding was hiding behind. "Holy Maker if you get me out of this
alive I swear on all my circuits that I'll find a nice little corner of the
universe and settle down with an automoton and have lots of little circuits
running around." she had begun to babble when she lost Doggeds signal, "Oh
FRAG IT." she fealt that the Cybrats had had it, there was no more time for
teamwork or unity it was now every bot for herself. She detected a support
beam and started launching fireballs repeatedly at it hoping to collapse the
tunnel either on top of the Autobots or between them there wasn't time to
care which she just didn't want to end up like poor Dogged.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2001 7:13 PM
Subject: Re: The bum and the hole...


> Yeah, my bot's a drunk. I think almost everyone meant him when they said
the bum.
>
> ::::
>
> Having disposed of Dogged, the bot hears someone call him, turning and
seeing a sword and shield flying at him. He grabs both, looking briefly to
see who had thrown it and finding no one who matched his mental description
of someone who'd have these sorts of weapons. He turns, seeing Repungus
going at Dogged, and finds a new target, firing his remaining shoulder
missile launcher at the debris that Branded was behind while heading toward
it.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: Cyberwolf, you'll have to repost with Branding. Interception of
> > weapon fire is frowned upon. =)
> >
> > --- Pacifix / Crossroads ---
> >
> > Pacifix misses his grab, and a sharp pain stabs into his chest and
> > he grunts. The force of the blow knocks him backwards a step, and
> > almost sets him off balance, and denting his heavy barricade mode
> > armour. He steps back again, and levels his freeze cannons at
> > Arty's shoulders in an attempt to stop the bot from moving his arms
> > at the shoulder. He fires twice with each arm freeze cannon for the
> > joints.
> >
> > Crossroads notices the strength advantage that the new bot
> > fighting with them has, and yells to the bot, (the bum) "Hey large
> > new bot, (he describes the bot, kinda like "hey you over there with
> > the red shirt" 'cept I don't know what the bot really looks like =P),
> > CATCH!" he transforms into plasma shield and sword mode,
> > launching himself at the bum, hilt and handle ready to be grabbed.
> > (Yan, if bum doesn't want Crossroads, he'll just transform again =)
>
>
>
